title: What are some good, recent rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm a big fan of hip-hop from the independent scene. Any song off of the following albums are songs I would suggest: Sage Francis - "Personal Journals"Sadistik - "Ultraviolet"Non-Prophets - "Hope"Astronautalis - "This is Our Science"P.O.S. - "Never Better"Eyedea & Abilities - "E&A"Sims - "Bad Time Zoo"Doomtree - "No Kings"Brother Ali - "Shadows on the Sun"Scroobius Pip - "Distraction Pieces"Transit - "Superman Took Steroids"Playdough - "Hotdoggin"SUMMON - "PUZLBOX"
